listing.name: TeamGantt
listing.description:
The [TeamGantt](https://www.teamgantt.com) Power-Up gives you the ability to view and schedule your cards in a beautiful timeline.

TeamGantt is the popular project scheduling tool used by thousands of customers in over 120 countries.

+ Organize cards from multiple boards into a single, beautiful gantt chart inside Trello
+ Add project dependencies and resourcing to Trello boards
+ Sync dates and completion rates across services automatically
+ Works in all major web browsers


![Gantt Chart](https://trello.teamgantt.com/images/screenshot.gif)
![Card back](https://trello.teamgantt.com/images/card-back.png)


### Two sync modes are available:


+ **Auto Link**
Automatically sync newly created cards and tasks from one Trello board to a single TeamGantt gantt chart. Cards are synced immediately on creation. This is the easiest and most common link type. Best if you want to have all the cards in a single board displayed in a Gantt chart.

![Sync Options](https://trello.teamgantt.com/images/sync-options.png)

+ **Manual Link**
Gives you full control over when and where your cards are synced to TeamGantt. As the name implies, this sync mode requires some manual work. You will need to individually pick which cards you want to display in a timeline. This allows you to pick and choose which cards you want to see in a Gantt chart

  + Send cards from one Trello board to multiple gantt charts
  + Sync cards from multiple Trello boards to a single gantt chart 
  + Cards are not automatically synced on creation, allowing you to finalize a card's details before syncing to TeamGantt
  + Manual Link is more hands on compared to Auto Link, but it gives you the ultimate in flexibility.

### Professional Gantt Charts Loaded With Features:

TeamGantt brings the leading online Gantt chart software to Trello!

![Features](https://trello.teamgantt.com/images/TeamGantt-trello.png)
listing.overview: View your cards in a beautiful timeline with the popular project scheduling tool used by thousands of customers in over 120 countries.

listing.name: Portant Document Merge
listing.description:
🤖 Generate and attach documents automatically from your Trello cards. Portant can create Google Docs and Slides from Trello Cards in the click of a button.
💫 Transform the your document admin into a well-oiled workflow, so you can free up time to work smarter, not harder. 
![An animation showing a google document being created from a Trello card.](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/5f3b57b53c8ce31aa9ca39a9/60e015f685c6ad8d5d2b0953_Website%20Hero%20animation.gif)
#Features
Here’s everything Portant Document Merge does...
📁 Document Generator - Creates Google Docs or Google Slides from Trello card data (data merge).
📎 Attach created docs and presentations automatically to Trello Cards
🤖 Batch create documents onto cards (by entire board or by list) 
✅ Make your documents more accurate. You won’t have to worry about mistakes from copying and pasting or manual data entry. Plus, your formatting is guaranteed to be consistent on all your documents.
⏱️ Save time. Delete copy and paste from your workday, and place your repetitive documents on auto-pilot.
📍 Centralise and consolidate your workflows in Trello and Google Workspace and reduce the number of external tools you rely on (and pay for)
###Features with the Google Workspace Add-on
And if you use our Google Add-on you'll be able to: 
🤖 Automatically creates new documents when a Google Form response is submitted (or when a Google Sheet is updated).
📄 Combines multiple rows from sheets into one document or presentation
✉️ Custom email messages (Mail Merge), email notifications and document sharing from your email address (via Gmail)
🧾 Automatically save documents and presentations as PDFs (Pro feature)

---

And that's not all…
🚀 We have big plans for Portant and a feature backlog that will enable you to create beautiful documents and presentations with less effort. 
💡 So if there is a feature that you would like to see, please let us know: contact@portant.co 

---

#How to start using Portant:
1️⃣ Install the Portant Document Merge Power-up.
2️⃣ Open a card on your board and then click _'Portant Document Merge'_.
3️⃣ Choose a _'Google Doc'_ or _'Google Slide'_ template.
4️⃣ Connect and authorise your Google account, then click the template again
5️⃣ Click _'Merge template name'_ to automatically create a document from the template and card data and attach it to the card.
6️⃣ Click edit (✏️), then click the template name to open the document to customise the file by using {{tags}}.
7️⃣ Optional | Install our [Google Workspace Add-on](https://gsuite.google.com/marketplace/app/portant_data_merge/1016888648275) to help customise the document.

---

#Solutions
There are many use cases...
📊 Project teams: Generate project status reports, end of week summaries, executive reports, team check-ins, end of month showcases.
🧾 Sales teams: Create pitch decks, sales letters, quotes, invoices or contracts 
👥 HR teams: Produce onboarding documents and contracts, salary updates, official employee letters
📦 Operation teams: Automate packing lists, carton labels, commercial invoices
🏅 Education and teachers: Make certificates, awards, progress reports, evaluations.
🎁 And many, many more! 

Portant is a great solution if you are overloaded from copy and pasting information into documents. Or if you’re looking for an alternative to simplify and centralise workflows built on top of Zapier, Workato or Integromat. 

---

Portant is a document merge and workflow Power-up available on the Trello Power-up marketplace.

---

##Useful links
📚 [Guides](https://www.portant.co/guides) - How to use Portant Document Merge
💌 [Contact us](https://www.portant.co/support) - Get in touch with us
🎁 [Google Workspace Add-on](https://gsuite.google.com/marketplace/app/portant_data_merge/1016888648275) - Check out our Google Add-on
💻 [Portant.co](https://www.portant.co) - Check out our website
listing.overview: Card-to-Document | Generate Google Documents from your Trello Cards and attach the file back onto the card (works with Custom Fields)

listing.name: Google Drive
listing.description:
The Google Drive Power-Up for Trello brings your files and folders to Trello cards. Search Google Drive right from Trello and attach relevant files and folders. See real-time previews and details and click back into Google Drive. It also lets you turn your Trello board into a Google Slides presentation with one click.

- Built in file search lets you attach folders and files from Google Drive to a Trello card on any version of Trello.
- See real-time information and previews for any Google Drive files or folders attached to cards.
- Turn your Trello board into a Google Slides presentation with one click.

![screenshot](https://google-drive.trello.services/images/screenshots/Google_Drive_1.jpg)
![screenshot](https://google-drive.trello.services/images/screenshots/Google_Drive_2.jpg)
![screenshot](https://google-drive.trello.services/images/screenshots/Google_Drive_3.jpg)
![screenshot](https://google-drive.trello.services/images/screenshots/Google_Drive_4.jpg)
listing.overview: Access your Drive files for a project directly from its card, or create and attach new Drive files to a card.

cards.name: 约一下马博士，赵乘一

attachments.name: Intern Record - lll - 约一下马博士，赵乘一

checkItems.name: 1. 做一个excel 把三个board的token存在里面，trello API [.xls]
2. 下载pandas，用python和pandas 读取excel数据，产生http link（string）[.py]
3. 用request 以及产生的http读取trello数据，返回一个json file [.json/.pickle]
4. 用python读取json file数据做数据处理 [.py]
5. 将处理好的数据push到google sheet，需要google sheet API
6. 把以上的python file 放在google drive里，最好可以用google sheet中的一个button自动运行和更新
